title: A deadly royal favourite?
itunes:title: A deadly royal favourite?
itunes:subtitle: Author and broadcaster Benjamin Woolley explores the very close relationship between James VI and I and his favourite the Duke of Buckingham. He also considers what role Buckingham may have played in the king’s demise
description:
Author and broadcaster Benjamin Woolley explores the very close relationship between James VI and I and his favourite the Duke of Buckingham. He also considers what role Buckingham may have played in the king’s demise

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
